column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop right lane is blocked between Old Frankfort Pike and Versailles Rd due to a large fuel spill.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Police are diverting traffic onto Old Frankfort Pike.  Motorists planning travel in this area should seek an alternate route.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Motorists can expect increased congestion on Old Frankfort Pike and S Forbes Rd.

column5: Multiple vehicles reportedly involved.  At least one lane is blocked.
Single trailer on its side along with excavator equipment.  The left and middle lanes are blocked.

column4: Inbound Newtown Pike at W Fourth St.
Inner loop New Circle Rd just prior to Leestown Rd.
